thread.title: Charlotte Crosby sparks romance rumours as she cuddles up to half-naked Stephen Bear in bed
thread.title_full: Charlotte Crosby sparks romance rumours as she cuddles up to half-naked Stephen Bear in bed

author: Joshua Haigh
title: Charlotte Crosby sparks romance rumours as she cuddles up to half-naked Stephen Bear in bed
text:
Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Charlotte Crosby seems to have a thing for bad boys. 
The former Geordie Shore star, who had her heart broken numerous times by MTV hunk Gaz Beadle, appears to have found herself a new man. 
While working on MTV show Just Tattoo Of Us with Stephen Bear , it looks as though the pair have hit it off more than they had expected. 
Fans watched the reality stars giggling and cuddling up together under a duvet on Bear's Snapchat, but the reality star deleted the video shortly after. The pair cuddled up in bed (Photo: bearzy1/snapchat) Are they dating? (Photo: Instagram/charlottegshore) 
A source exclusively told The Sun Online: “Bear kept the Snapchat up for around 15 minutes before deleting it. 
“He was giggling about the toothpaste on his face and Charlotte cuddled up to him the whole way through.” 
Despite their cuddly behaviour, Charlotte denied recently that she was enjoying a romance with the notorious womaniser. 
She told Heat magazine: “We’re just very good friends. Just good friends. We spent a lot of time together, but that was just filming 16 hours a day for Just Tattoo of Us. 
“When we were filming, we were constantly play-fighting with each other, or doing something to wind each other up,” she added. Charlotte has previously denied the claims (Photo: Instagram/charlottegshore) 
The romance rumours are a far cry from reports late last year that the reality pair weren't seeing eye-to-eye on set of the show. 
A source had told The Sun: “Charlotte and Bear have not been seeing eye to eye on their new show. Charlotte finds Bear annoying and unprofessional. She doesn't think he has earned his fame. 
“A lot of people think she is finding it difficult to share the limelight with him after hosting a TV series on her own in the past." Like us on Facebook
